alert.note: Alert for Craig; Nowata (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 19 at 8:54PM CDT until September 19 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN CRAIG AND NORTHEASTERN NOWATA COUNTIES... At 853 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Edna, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Welch... Hollow... Pyramid Corners... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
